page.shortlink: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed
page.topic: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed
page.description: If you try to generate reports using the Amyuni printer driver and the driver is not installed, you may receive an error message.

important.p: The Amyuni Printer is no longer distributed with Alpha Anywhere starting with version 4.6.2.7 (build 7544). To get the Amyuni Printer drivers, you must first install an older version of Alpha Anywhere.

section.description: The Amyuni printer was distributed as part of the Alpha Anywhere in past releases. The driver was used to generate Reports. If the Amyuni printer is not installed and you attempt to create a report using the Amyuni driver, the report will fail to generate. The missing printer may manifest as an error when you try to create a Report:

figure.alt: Report did not print. Error reported was: 'Alpha Five Printer' (for creating PDF, RTF and HTMl output) is not installed. Re-install Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS at line: 31
figure.title: Error message sent from the Report server if the Amyuni printer driver is missing

section.description: In order to create reports with the Amyuni drivers, you need to install the Amyuni printer.

section.title: Installing Amyuni Printer for Alpha Anywhere Developer and Standard Application Server

description.p: *[For versions of Alpha Anywhere prior to 4.6.2.7]*: To install the Amyuni printer for Alpha Anywhere Developer Edition or Alpha Anywhere Standard Application Server, you need to reinstall Alpha Anywhere. Locate the installer for the Alpha Anywhere version you have installed and run the installer. The Amyuni Printer will be installed as part of the installation of Alpha Anywhere.

*[For versions of Alpha Anywhere on or after 4.6.2.7]*: The Amyuni Printer is no longer distributed with Alpha Anywhere starting with version 4.6.2.7 (build 7544). To get the Amyuni Printer drivers, you must first install an older version of Alpha Anywhere. Then, update to the version of Alpha Anywhere that you are using.

section.title: Installing Amyuni Printer for Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS

description.p: *[For versions of Alpha Anywhere prior to 4.6.2.7]*: For Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS, the Amyuni printer can be installed by running the *[A5IISInstallServer.exe]* located in the IIS Application Server's installation directory. Open command prompt with the "Run as Administrator" option and run the installer:

section.example:
C:\Program Files (x86)\A5V12 Application Server for IIS>A5IISInstallServer.exe
C:\Program Files (x86)\A5V12 Application Server for IIS>

description.p: *[For versions of Alpha Anywhere on or after 4.6.2.7]*: The Amyuni Printer is no longer distributed with Alpha Anywhere starting with version 4.6.2.7 (build 7544). To get the Amyuni Printer drivers, you must first install an older version of Alpha Anywhere. Then, update to the version of Alpha Anywhere that you are using.

section.description: In some situations, the Amyuni installer can fail. If errors occur during installation, see *[link:Application Server for IIS Amyuni Installer Error@Application Server for IIS Amyuni Installer Error]* for more information.

ref.link: Application Server for IIS Amyuni Installer Error

see.ref: Application Server for IIS Amyuni Installer Error
